mapper.select: select card_id, card_number, card_balance, card_state, card_sign, card_duedate, card_date, card_usablebalanc, card_alias, card_handledate, card_startdate, card_limit, card_currency, card_aa, card_bb, card_peson, card_applyid from js_creditcard.creditcard_card where card_number = #{cardNumber}

select card_id, card_number, card_balance, card_state, card_sign, card_duedate, card_date, card_usablebalanc, card_alias, card_handledate, card_startdate, card_limit, card_currency, card_aa, card_bb, card_peson, card_applyid from js_creditcard.creditcard_card where card_peson = #{cardPeson}

select card_id, card_number, card_balance, card_state, card_sign, card_duedate, card_date, card_usablebalanc, card_alias, card_handledate, card_startdate, card_limit, card_currency, card_aa, card_bb, card_peson, card_applyid from js_creditcard.creditcard_card where card_number = #{cardNumber}

select card_id, card_number, card_balance, card_state, card_sign, card_duedate, card_date, card_usablebalanc, card_alias, card_handledate, card_startdate, card_limit, card_currency, card_aa, card_bb, card_peson, card_applyid from js_creditcard.creditcard_card where card_id = #{cardId}

select card_id, card_number, card_balance, card_state, card_sign, card_duedate, card_date, card_usablebalanc, card_alias, card_handledate, card_startdate, card_limit, card_currency, card_aa, card_bb, card_peson, card_applyid from js_creditcard.creditcard_card limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into js_creditcard.creditcard_card(card_number, card_balance, card_state, card_sign, card_duedate, card_date, card_usablebalanc, card_alias, card_handledate, card_startdate, card_limit, card_currency, card_aa, card_bb, card_peson, card_applyid) values (#{cardNumber}, #{cardBalance}, #{cardState}, #{cardSign}, #{cardDuedate}, #{cardDate}, #{cardUsablebalanc}, #{cardAlias}, #{cardHandledate}, #{cardStartdate}, #{cardLimit}, #{cardCurrency}, #{cardAa}, #{cardBb}, #{cardPeson}, #{cardApplyid})
mapper.update:
update js_creditcard.creditcard_card
card_number = #{cardNumber},
card_balance = #{cardBalance},
card_state = #{cardState},
card_sign = #{cardSign},
card_duedate = #{cardDuedate},
card_date = #{cardDate},
card_usablebalanc = #{cardUsablebalanc},
card_alias = #{cardAlias},
card_handledate = #{cardHandledate},
card_startdate = #{cardStartdate},
card_limit = #{cardLimit},
card_currency = #{cardCurrency},
card_aa = #{cardAa},
card_bb = #{cardBb},
card_peson = #{cardPeson},
card_applyid = #{cardApplyid},
where card_id = #{cardId}

update js_creditcard.creditcard_card
card_id = #{cardId},
card_balance = #{cardBalance},
card_state = #{cardState},
card_sign = #{cardSign},
card_duedate = #{cardDuedate},
card_date = #{cardDate},
card_usablebalanc = #{cardUsablebalanc},
card_alias = #{cardAlias},
card_handledate = #{cardHandledate},
card_startdate = #{cardStartdate},
card_limit = #{cardLimit},
card_currency = #{cardCurrency},
card_aa = #{cardAa},
card_bb = #{cardBb},
card_bb = 0.0
card_peson = #{cardPeson},
card_applyid = #{cardApplyid},
where card_number = #{cardNumber}
